website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for something more traditional, consider this cherry-finished wooden headboard from Dorel Living.
pros: Cherry finish offers a classic look
Recessed panels and decorative top rail
Easy to assemble and install, but having more than one person may be helpful
Sturdy and good quality for the price

customer_reviews.title: Good headboard for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is a substantial headboard. easy to put together and fit with the frame I purchased. There was a large blemish on one piece and I had to turn it over and the sticker was difficult to remove without damage; even with goo-b-gone. I'm 5'6" and it comes to my chest. I haven't had a headboard in a few years and didn't remember this being this tall. Also, finish is a bit shiner than expected. Reminds me of old bedroom furniture that has a high gloss. So if the shiny gloss doesn't distract, it's a great piece and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I bought two of these the first one took me twenty minutes with Grand Children running around. The second took me ten after they went home. Looks much more expensive than it really is. This has to be the easiest piece of furniture I have ever assembled. Totally intuitive, the cams go on the back, and that's the way it goes together. Panels are made to float in the uprights and center piece no glue needed. It's just a headboard after all and doesn't need to support any weight.
customer_reviews.author: Damn Yankee

customer_reviews.title: but found nothing I really liked in the local stores
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to decide on a headboard. Was a bit leary of buying online, but found nothing I really liked in the local stores. So...was delightfully surprised when it arrived earlier than expected. It is a nice sturdy/heavy piece once put together. As with all lower end furniture there was a bit of grumbling as I worked with a couple of the bolts. Would be nice if there were those wood look stickers to place over the ends of the bolts, but is probably only something I notice. I do love that it blends nicely with my wood end tables. So close in color that few will notice. Love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice headboard
customer_reviews.text: The finished product looks very nice, but it is a bit more red colored than I anticipated. In my mind, cherry is a dark brown with a red tint, thus the four stars. Everything went together perfectly, all the holes were in the correct places and the pieces were properly marked. This headboard, thankfully, came with all the hardwear (one reason I selected this particular one). The nuts and bolts were all marked and neatly wrapped with instructions and pictures. Some of the headboards on Amazon indicated that no hardwear was included, and for klutzes like my husband and me, that would have been a disaster! We managed to put it together and it is perfect in our spare bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: AZclaire

customer_reviews.title: I regret purchasing this.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. After assembling the entire headboard, I come to find out the top part has about a quarter inch gap and will not attach and you can see the screws. Now I'm supposed to package all up and return it. A waste of time and money . I would not recommend this item. I am no longer comfortable ordering furniture from amazon. I know it's not directly from amazon, but I'm not no longer comfortable. I don't want to go through so much trouble only to find out the product was made incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expect 3 hours of assembly!!!!! BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought many many times products on amazon and am reluctant to leave poor reviews. This product takes a team of people to build it’s really ridiculous. Your are expect to be the assemblyman for this product build if from scratch essentially. I have no time to do such a thing between work and school. Your labor for this product and your time is more valuable than this. Also every single piece is horrid quality
customer_reviews.author: john moschetti

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headboard, the only problem is that the number markers on the pieces cause at least one of the pieces to have this thing facing the bed. The way the drilled the holes and the fasteners you can't get all of the marked sides facing the wall. Fortunately the bed is tall enough so the number mark is mainly hidden by the mattress. Otherwise easy to assemble, you might want to have a helper as you need to hold several pieces together at the same time to insert the fasteners and tighten them so an extra pair of hands is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rink

customer_reviews.title: Odd finish color different than picture, but a value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a value, but it's not perfect by any means. First the arched piece at the top wouldn't fit without trimming, something most buyers probably aren't prepared for. More of a problem is the finish color. It's a weird orange-red not unlike sweet and sour sauce. I actually went over it with another stain to make it work, but again most people wouldn't want the hassle. So...for $75. it is what it is. Just don't expect an heirloom piece.
customer_reviews.author: Spec Builder

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Beautiful. Easy.
customer_reviews.text: A little worried reading some of the reviews where people had problems putting this thing together but I was pleasantly surprised when I got it and put it together it was actually really easy. Also really like how thick the board is and I really like the beautiful red cherry color. It's lovely. Yes the wood is cheap and it might scratch easily. But it looks great and it feels sturdy attached to the bed. I got it put together no problems all the pieces fit together correctly and I am very happy with this purchase. Be gentle putting it together and follow the instructions exactly and you'll be good. It looks great in my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia

customer_reviews.title: This product gets one star because I can't give it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product gets one star because I can't give it zero. The holes for the wood dowels and the cams were in the wrong spots in two separate spots. I repair and build homes so this should have been simple. With some bolts washers, lock washers and nuts which I happened to have I made it work. After I put the top piece on it tightened the headboard up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Came as a box full of boards and screws (and the ubiquitous cams), I wasn't sure if I was supposed to build a headboard or a tower of blocks. But, once I got it together, (the directions were fairly straight-forward), it's beautiful. My wife loves it, therefore I love it. To avoid the issue with the stickers another person mentioned, I made sure they were all in the back, since the headboard is going against a wall, no one will ever see them.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Lewis

customer_reviews.title: great headboard for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just put this together and attached it to the bed in less than 45 minutes, on my own, with a baby and 2 year old in the room with me! It's that easy! All the prices are very good quality and well made. I didn't have anything crack or break when I assembled it! It is a very nice color and looks great all put together!! I am 100% satisifed with this headboard, and the price was fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wietfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, on-time delivery, sturdy design
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered on-time, packaged well and easy to assemble. Looks sturdy and instructions were very clear, with all bolts, etc. labeled and drawings clear. All bolts, dowels, nuts, etc. included in packaging, as well as Allen wrench for assembly. You will only need a Phillips and straight screwdriver. Weight is about 30 lbs so might take two to carry box.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Reid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking headboard to dress up a guest bedroom. Easy assembly - assemble on carpeted floor. Most of the headboard is made from solid wood. The panel inserts are made from a venered wood product. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Not Solid Wood Like the Description Claims
customer_reviews.text: All of the people saying this is a solid wood headboard must have received a different product than I did. This thing is made of cheap, flimsy PARTICLE BOARD. The description and all the great reviews saying this is solid wood are very misleading. It is NOT solid wood. Upon realizing this I didn't even attempt to assemble it. I just put it back in the box and returned it. If you're wanting a real, solid wood headboard then look elsewhere. This is nothing more than cheap, Vietnamese made particle board with a thin laminate over it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive headboard
customer_reviews.text: I have put off finding a headboard for years... I liked this design and found that it was very easy to put together and place securely to my metal bed frame. The wood is very pretty, came packaged well and safely.
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: Devil of a thing to put together
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is almost comically tiresome to put together. It must have been designed by a bored engineer who was longing to build bridges. The simple little headboard comes in multiple pieces, with devilishly complex interlocking sections, multiple screws and dowels. But if you can get through the chore of putting it together, it works as okay as an inexpensive headboard, and it is real wood, stained a fairly light cherry color. Just keep in mind that's all it is, a headboard -- you have to provide your own bedframe and footboard.
customer_reviews.author: Lan the Answer Man

customer_reviews.title: Made work but had to cut on of the pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Construction is OK but had to cut part of head board to make it fit properly. Luckily I had a table saw to adjust the size of the piece that was to big. Wouldn't suggest for someone with out a table saw just in case theirs isn't made correctly either.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Look's Great.
customer_reviews.text: Headboard look's great, dressed my bed up nicely assembly was easy, and headboard is very sturdy. I like it and have had no troubles what so ever with it. 5 star's.
customer_reviews.author: snowshoe

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that assembly isn't as easy as 1-2-3
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that assembly isn't as easy as 1-2-3. The picture and the description (says assembly required) of this headboard made me think it was one big piece requiring the attachment of two feet. The wood started to shred as the turning of the screw was going into the main piece. The quality of wood was poor, particle board. Thankfully I was able to send back and get my money back. What a waist of time!! :(
customer_reviews.author: Italian/IrishAmericanProud!

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works great for a full size bed!
customer_reviews.text: The cherry wood color is really nice. This is a great headboard for the price. I used it with a full size bed in our guest room and it looks great. There are not large gaps. It came packaged well. The hardest part of putting it all together was getting the screws out of the package. Everything else was super easy. The easiest thing I've built in a long time. It comes with the screws to attach the frame to the headboard and everything. Great value, great price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Snoz

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Cardboard would be better. NOT solid wood, poorly packaged, no instructions, flimsy, almost a bright red. DO NOT waste your money. Buyer beware.i would not want it if they gave it to me.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, and it looks good. The design is simple yet elegant. It matched my cherry furniture that originally came with a sleigh bed. I much prefer the bed with just a headboard attached to a metal frame. It makes the bed easier to move. There was only 1 dime sized flaw in the finish of one of the panels. I placed the flaw facing the wall and below the top of the matress, so no one should ever know it is there, unless they move the bed away from the wall. At a price of under $90, this was a good investment and added a nice finishing touch to my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Geodenizen

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headboard for almost three months and the right leg has split. Now we've got to come up with a way to rig it up so that it doesn't totally collapse or we just take it to the dump...VERY dissatisfied with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: LovinLife

customer_reviews.title: Mostly awesome, somewhat flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was damaged due to poor handling, which caused light cosmetic damage. Also, some hardware will need to be replaced (cam bolts were stripped and do not tighten properly.Will fix myself) Lastly, had to force the headboard bolt cutouts to align properly with attachment rails. Overall, i do enjoy the product immensely, despite the issues. Thanks. Attached are pictures of light damage.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Real wood, easily assembled
customer_reviews.text: Nice, real wood headboard that is easy to assemble. It arrived packaged well and with no damage. The assembly directions were clear to understand, and easy to follow. Assembly took maybe 30 minutes. It includes bolts to mount the headboard to the frame which was a nice touch. The color is uniform throughout the headboard. The color is really red, much more red than I was expecting. Overall very happy with the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: fuel98rider

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headboard! Easy to assemble, just follow the instructions. Definitely recommend it. Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard great price
customer_reviews.text: Anyone wanting a quality cherrywood headboard I highly recommend this one easy to put together real wood and I am a disabled senior and put it together myself keep the good products coming amazon I am new to shopping online but am a very satisfied customer and great reviews helped I my decision the price was great as well could find this in big box store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headboard for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish is well above what I expected. Assembly was fairly simple and the instructions were easy to follow. If I had to find something that I didn't like it was the stickers were hard to remove but the headboard could be assembled so that the stickers were not visible on the front. I would buy again. It is lighter than it appears in the pic. but that was not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking great!
customer_reviews.text: Date: 12/22/16 - SECOND/UPDATED REVIEW. Amazon's reliable Customer Service replaced the item at no charge. Damaged item was mailed back. The new headboard looks and feels great! Lots of work and patience was needed, but I am now happy for this purchase. Date: 12/15/16 - FIRST REVIEW. Huge disappointment. Completely flimsy. Won't stay together, keeps falling apart. If able to assemble it properly, it'd look great. Nice wood and color. See pictures. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXA50E

customer_reviews.title: Holes do not line up for double bed..
customer_reviews.text: The holes in the headboard do not line up with the holes in my double bed. Cannot use!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Grib

customer_reviews.title: I like this headboard and it looks very nice in our ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this headboard and it looks very nice in our spare room. I would not recommend this product for every day use but it is perfect for a spare room or similar set up. The parts are clearly marked and most tools are included. I would advise not over tightening the hardware as the wood is thin and could crack easily. We have received some nice compliments from those who have stayed over.
customer_reviews.author: FoCoMama

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, did not fit together snug, doesn't mount well to a metal bed frame, it wiggles a lot. We had to put foam behind it to keep from damaging wall. Ended up removing after a month and trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Strom

customer_reviews.title: Five star value!
customer_reviews.text: I was fresh out of the hospital when I assembled this. I figured how to assemble up and down. Simplicity. This is a great piece of assemble yourself furniture. And good looking? I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kobjack

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy. Very flimsy. Not real wood except for ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Very flimsy. Not real wood except for the pine posts. A pain to put together. It's not inaccurate to label it cherry color but it is a very orangey red, not a rich brownish red. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, easy to assemble, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant surprise...this headboard looks good in person, was easy to assemble and mount on the bed frame, and looks good in use. The headboard is not especially thick/substantial, but at this price you aren't going to get four inches thick mahogany, right? :) Bottom line it looks great in our guest room. I would order this again if we needed another.
customer_reviews.author: D. White

customer_reviews.title: Don't
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking. Scratches and dents very easy. This will probably end up in the garbage soln, haven't even owned it for six months.
customer_reviews.author: MommaV

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that what appeared to be a simple headboard, actually had to be assembled. However, it was easy to assemble and actually looks pretty nice. I has no complaints at all about the quality of the headboard considering the price. My only complaint is that it knocks against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: The info I found on the net said these two won't work together but with a ink marker and a drill we were good to go
customer_reviews.text: Used this with the Zinus 16 inch SmartBase bed frame and Zinus head board brackets. The info I found on the net said these two won't work together but with a ink marker and a drill we were good to go. Headboard is of better quality than I expected for the price and assembly took about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headboard
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when reading the negative comments but I had no issues with the quality of this headboard. All of the parts fit perfectly and the workmanship was very good. I followed the advice of one reviewer who suggested using wood glue when inserting the wooden dows. It makes the headboard much sturdier. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: lwpknp

customer_reviews.title: but once finished it looked good. If you are looking for something thick and ...
customer_reviews.text: A little bit too red compared to nightstands i ordered of same color but different company. I had a hard time putting together one of the sections, but once finished it looked good. If you are looking for something thick and firm, do not buy it. It works good for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: The stain was beautiful. I coated mine with a few coats of ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality for the price. This HB is solid wood (pine I believe). It's not a cheap manufactured board, particle strand board, etc. The stain was beautiful. I coated mine with a few coats of wipe on poly for added durability. Any pine without a hard finish is not very durable and it will scratch up fairly quick without protection
customer_reviews.author: Mob-barley

customer_reviews.title: Other than that minor problem this headboard is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The two main flat panel sections of mine are two different shades of cherry. Other than that minor problem this headboard is good for the price. I recommend putting wood glue on all the sections when you assemble it or it will creak Every time it moves. I put it together without glue then took it back apart and added glue and now it seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Geetar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood. Can't go wrong at this price. Easy to assemble. Definitely a tall headboard. If you don't have a box spring you will want to put your frame on risers and drill new holes to attach or mount to wall. Accidentally bought two, and if I had two beds I'd have kept both.
customer_reviews.author: jonas190

customer_reviews.title: It is a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid wood Headboard. It is a great buy for the price, but the color is more red than the photo shows. If you are looking for dark cherry, this will be a fair bit lighter. It will not match up with the Sauder Palladia furniture for example, but it is a good headboard. it is not very heavy and is padded, which is not clearly visible in the photo
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D Korinek

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping (or before)
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it was damaged in shipping, the color looked great. The quality was what can be expected for a 75$ headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but looks nice. great for a smaller room
customer_reviews.text: Extremly thin, but looks nice. great for a smaller room. Not too hard to put together. Only thing is they put the sticker right in the middle and it's been hard getting the sticky residue off with out messing up the finish.
customer_reviews.author: ladypearl 93

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made headboard. A bit lighter weight than I expected, but that's good as well. Good solid wood, classy and classic appearance. I am very happy with it... especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: It's That Guy Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Lovely wooden headboard. Fit together well. Just wish my bed rails werent so high.
customer_reviews.author: KgB-Agent

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The bed board has to many parts to fit and the top piece gave me a hard time to slide in the grove because the grove was very tight for the fitting part and resulted in an imperfect assembly. The quality of the wood and the finish is high quality but need to improve on carpentry so that all parts fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cherry is pretty darn red
customer_reviews.text: The cherry is pretty darn red...just know that....much brighter than the Amazon image. The outside of the headboard is solid but the middle is just cheap panel. Pretty luke warm on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Jenson

customer_reviews.title: We were constantly browsing brick and mortar stores searching for a solution - this one looks great for less than half the price we were seeing ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely can't beat the quality for price. We were constantly browsing brick and mortar stores searching for a solution - this one looks great for less than half the price we were seeing elsewhere. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Better than nothing I suppose. Looks a little cheap, but super cheap. If the posts would have been square, it would look much better.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but the driections are lacking
customer_reviews.text: We finally got it put together but the directions were missing a few steps. Had to go by the picture for the final steps.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made and ugly.... I am ...
customer_reviews.text: cheaply made and ugly....I am not going cheap next time I need a headboard, which is soon because this won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY AND VERY FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom and she loves it. My daughter was able to set it up without any help in an hour. There were just a couple little flaws in the wood, but all in all a very good purchase for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: grrat deal
customer_reviews.text: This hradboard arrived quickly, I was able to put it together in about an hour by myself. It easily bolted to the full bed frame. It really dors look great in my son's room. It did have a strong chemical smell when we put it in the room. We wiped it down, opened windows, and turned on fans to air it out. The smell was gone by the next day. Overall, a grrat value!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great project to teach your teenager the importance of following ...
customer_reviews.text: Great project to teach your teenager the importance of following directions. It took about an hour for mom & 17 year old son to assemble (because Mom didn't quite follow the directions), but we did it. Good quality, sturdy, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these headboards for our spare bedrooms. The wood is beautiful cherry and the are solid. They were easily attached to the bed .
customer_reviews.author: Mommiejoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased our second Dorel headboard A great product for the price; easily assembled; very sturdy; highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Capt. I. B. Brokenow

customer_reviews.title: Headboard
customer_reviews.text: It looks good just not as solid as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Had to use a wood router on the top of ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to use a wood router on the top of the headboard, It was not deep enough to sit flush when trying to screw it on
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood, great look
customer_reviews.text: We waited an eternity to finally get a headboard. This has a nice clean look and is solid wood. I would recommend using a French cleat to attach it to the wall instead of screwing into the bed frame. After making this change there is no more movement or wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W

customer_reviews.title: Holes doesn't line up with my bedframe correctly. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Holes doesn't line up with my bedframe correctly. Had to use extra screws. Leans away from wall also. Had to be anchored to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, inexpensive, attractive headboard for a great price. Easy to assemble. Requires only one person. Tools are included. It makes a nice addition to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Pressley Drouant

customer_reviews.title: So-so quality/fit of pieces.....
customer_reviews.text: Shipped knocked-down - in unassembled pieces. Looks okay-good, but is difficult to assemble as all the pieces do not fit together precisely as intended. Result: small, but visible gaps between headboard panels and surrounding frame element(s)..
customer_reviews.author: Charles Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautifull finish fit perfect on my queen bed frame very happy
customer_reviews.author: RUDY PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Even though I do really like the headboard
customer_reviews.text: Even though I do really like the headboard, the package was extremely damaged in the mail. The bottom of the package was ripped out and the hardware and directions were missing. I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning the damaged package and waiting for a new one. I went out and bought the hardware myself and I found the directions online. The headboard itself looks beautiful. I was just disappointed with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Victorious

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal... looks like a more expensive headboard. Used in my son's room to match up to a queen size Sleep Number mattress set,
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: Needed a headboard not too big and not too fancy. Looks very nice with my bed
customer_reviews.author: R E

customer_reviews.title: it's not bad
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It's not one piece either. It's more like 7 or so. It takes two to put together because the pieces won't stay connected but once u have all the nuts bolts screws in it holds up pretty well We have only had it up 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: heather R.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprisd
customer_reviews.text: Just put this together and installed to a queen frame. This was replacing our king headboard which had been leaning against the wall for the last year. Instructions were easy to follow, but I have worked with wood in bring old back to life. It is a solid headboard. Assembled and attached to the bed in less time than it took me to re-install the king headboard on the king bed in the guest room. I am female and close to 70 and I had no problems following the instructions. I did use a rubber mallet and a block of wood to lightly tap pieces into place for a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: ALG

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: It worked except it didn't attach to the bottom of our frame, so it is off the floor. It is tight on the frame. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Great reasonably priced headboard
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was no problem. Mounted onto bed frame with no problem. Hardware came packaged and sorted. It looks great. Just what my guest room needed. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice & meets needs
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Arrived quickly. Some assembly but not bad. Put together while we ate dinner. Fit on a queen bed frame fine. Looks nice & meets needs.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Are you going to make more?
customer_reviews.text: Why did this product run out of stock. What a disappointment. Loved the product but are sorry for its lack of availablity.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Atkinson, President KACOA Hospitality Inc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Matches great with other Cherry colored furniture in my bedroom. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Pecan4

customer_reviews.title: Totally impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this when I got home at 6:30 tonight and had it assembled and attached to my queen size bed by 7. Incredibly impressed with the wood and hardware! I kind of expected particle board and plastic. Looks super nice especially for the price. I also never write reviews on here but I had to for this one. Happy chica right here. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nice looking piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Love this headboard. Exactly what I was looking for. The color matches my night stands perfectly and easily assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I do like the style and the color but I would not ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the bolts didn't fit has a scratch on the front. Shipping box was crushed and taped shut. I do like the style and the color but I would not order again I would rather go to a store and see what I am buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetically Perfect for bedroom...
customer_reviews.text: This is truely a beautiful addition to my bedroom at low cost. I did not want to purchase a whole wooden bed frame...simply wanted to change out the headboard. My teenage grandson put the frame together and attached to my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice.....
customer_reviews.text: A very nice headboard which was easy to assemble as long as you follow the instructions step by step.
customer_reviews.author: wshanks39

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but some assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but harder to assemble than I had anticipated. It comes in about 10 wood pieces plus hardware. Instructions were fairly straightforward, just more pieces and more steps than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Cotnoir

customer_reviews.title: Really not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Wood is solid. I was a little concerned about rattle since it was several pieces but it turned out to be almost non-existent and it really did go together quick and easy... how do I post the picture?
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what to make of this... ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to make of this....the headboard didn't exactly fit in place.....and sending it back would have been more trouble than it was worth.....ended up having it fixed by someone else
customer_reviews.author: TeeLitt

customer_reviews.title: that worked out nicely. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I attached it to a Sleep Master Smartbase with the additional mounting kit, that worked out nicely. Unfortunately, it arrived without one of the built in nuts in the center panel, so I had to clamp and glue it together. Worse, I had to chisel out the top of the headboard to get a slat to fit in correctly. It does seem to be made of mostly real wood, it's fairly solid and looks nice. The price wasn't bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: I put this together according to the manual but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this together according to the manual but the screws/ fasteners would not tighten properly. My bed frame is wobbly and is not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product...Dont Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap production...not worth a quarter...dont waste your money. After all the time to put it together...the boards dont fit together. Crappy headboard!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Huff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a great bargain and not difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nannie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant beautiful color...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase is very elegant, beautiful color, solid wood, easy to assemble and brings the screws and tools needed for assembly. Even though I love it, the reason I'm giving it 4 stars is that in a part I arrive with a scratched. Although not visible at all
customer_reviews.author: Marc R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a guest bedroom and it's very nice. If it came in twin size, I'd be buying 2 more. My husband assembled it without a problem and he's happy with it also. It's rare to find solid wood at this price.
customer_reviews.author: suzieg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Package came today, took me about 40 min to put together myself, very easy to read instructions and all necessary tools and hardware were provided. Color was a bit lighter than I thought, but overall I'm very satisfied with it ..
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hall

customer_reviews.title: High quality product at good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product made of real wood. Easy to assemble. It's refreshing to see high quality product at good price (I think it is made in Canada). No surprises here. It's more than I expected and I'll be getting another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. This is without a doubt the worst item I have ever purchased from Amazon. It doesn’t fit a queen bed. Junk, just junk.
customer_reviews.author: kelly love

customer_reviews.title: the headboard does not adequately join to my bedframe. ...
customer_reviews.text: the headboard does not adequately join to my bedframe. The mounting holes are drilled correctly, but the design is so sloppy it really ruins any functional use of the headboard. You cant move on it at all without it slamming into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice looking piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was difficult as one of the panels was slightly warped. It took two of us to gently force it into place. Also, headboard arrived damaged either when picked from warehouse or during shipping. It had a scratch (gouge) through the cardboard box onto the wood of the one leg of the headboard. Luckily it was the side that was against the wall. If we didn't need it right away, I would have shipped it back. Other than that, it is a nice looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Decker

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The headboard arrived as descriptions and easily to install. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I have been wanting this headboard for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have been wanting this headboard for about 2 years, I finally bought it; and I love it. it completes my Master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The middle plate was a little too tall and can't be used. Figured out after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: very well made and easy to put together with help but I got it ...
customer_reviews.text: very well made and easy to put together with help but I got it together myself without much effort, I recommend this product *****
customer_reviews.author: J I

product_meta.title: Dorel Living Queen or Full-Sized Headboard in Solid Wood in Cherry Finish
product_meta.description: The beautifully-molded design of the full/queen headboard fits any modern bedroom. Featuring a richly textured cherry finish, this queen bed frame headboard is just the right size for a two-person bed. The recessed panels of this cherry headboard give it an appealing look, and it also features a decorative top rail for added elegance. Relax at the end of the day in your comfortable and stylish bed, or lean back against the full/queen headboard and enjoy a good read in the afternoon. The sturdy, solid design of this cherry headboard will last for generations. This queen bed frame headboard will add a touch of luxury to your home. Do not use power tools
feature_bullets: Sturdy Construction; Partial panel headboard with wood cutout and a cherry finish
Can accommodate a full or queen bed frame
Bed frame and mattress sold separately
No need to shop, delivered to your home!
This item is eligible for free replacement parts. Contact Amazon Customer Service for more information.
